about_the_game:
As beautiful and powerful as the Street Fighter character she is inspired by, Chun-Li is ready to make her way onto the track with her agility. She is M. Bison's sworn enemy, but she will have no mercy on any rival!

The car's appearance recalls the traditional Chinese dress worn by Chun-Li, with a blue body and golden details while the sides feature the iconic double buns that made her hairstyle famous.
Chun-Li in Chinese means "Beautiful Spring" and for you it means that a wonderful season... of races is about to start! Add it to your collection, it's definitely the winning move!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2
detailed_description:
As beautiful and powerful as the Street Fighter character she is inspired by, Chun-Li is ready to make her way onto the track with her agility. She is M. Bison's sworn enemy, but she will have no mercy on any rival!

The car's appearance recalls the traditional Chinese dress worn by Chun-Li, with a blue body and golden details while the sides feature the iconic double buns that made her hairstyle famous.
Chun-Li in Chinese means "Beautiful Spring" and for you it means that a wonderful season... of races is about to start! Add it to your collection, it's definitely the winning move!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Beautiful and powerful, Chun-Li will make her way onto the track with her agility. Her name means "Beautiful Spring" so get ready for a wonderful season... of races! Add it to your collection, it's definitely the winning move!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
